Summary Creative and future-looking Communications and Operations Manager with extensive corporate, media, communications and training experience. 
 
- Practical understanding of business operations to improve efficiency. 
- Marcom and multimedia experience spanning more than 15 years. 
- Technical expertise in a variety of software applications including graphics, video, and database programs. 
- Hands-on experience with storyboarding, scripting, editing, and producing creative digital stories. Summary Creative and future-looking Communications and Operations Manager with extensive corporate, media, communications and training experience.

Experience Business Operations and Marketing Manager Intel Corporation 2013  – Present (2 years) Portland, Oregon Area • Maintain cadence of Staff meetings, agendas and status reports. Consolidated meetings to drive efficiencies resulting in increased participation and balanced agendas. 
• Develop high quality and original content for internal and external meetings for employees, X-group teams, field sales and customers to provide clear and consistent messaging. 
• Streamline the review process and updates for business group objectives to enable better staff alignment/visibility into progress and report out for employees. 
• Drive strategic communication plan to reinforce understanding and line-of-site from employees to business strategy; build pride and visibility for teams and projects.  
• Develop and execute social media plans.
